oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Uni Ryan to Jabez Cannon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Four page letter from Uni Ryan (a Union veteran) to Jabez Cannon formerly of Co. C, 27th Ala. Inf. Regt., CSA. The letter is dated July 15, 1899 and was written from Reading, Penn. Mr. Ryan describes his experiences at the Battle of Chickamauga.; He describes guarding watermelons and cantelopes for a Col. Alexander.
